about.title: About
about.first: My name is João Henrique, I was born in Ribeirão Preto/SP and I live in Brasília/DF. I graduated in Law from UniCEUB, I studied for a long time to be public server, and I made the transition to the technology area recently, my true passion
about.second: I'm studying Systems Analysis and Development, I do a lot of study and the most important thing in my view: I'm passionate about technology.
about.third: I try to update myself, I'm very curious and I'm always looking for new technologies. I'm starting to develop personal projects.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.coopersystem: Internship. I work on the backend developing improvements and maintenance on a platform called Curia, applied in microservices, using as a basis technologies such as GraphQL and Node.JS.
experience.cytei: I started as WordPress Manager. After redesigning the company's homepage, I started to participate in the development of the startup's DashBoard, which focused on being a renewable energy market. I worked with ReactJS and Python at this company, and even at moment I make contributions.

footer.description: This website is open source and you can download
